title: Reset Password
content: Users can reset their password by navigating to Settings > Security > Reset Password. Click on 'Forgot Password' and enter your registered email address. You will receive a password reset link via email within 5 minutes. The link expires after 24 hours for security reasons. If you don't receive the email, check your spam folder or request a new link. For security, you cannot reuse your last 5 passwords. If you're locked out after multiple failed attempts, wait 30 minutes or contact support. Password reset links can only be used once and become invalid after use. Make sure to create a strong password with at least 8 characters including uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters.

title: Account Creation
content: To create a new account, visit the signup page and provide your full name, email address, and a strong password. Passwords must be at least 8 characters long and contain uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters. After registration, verify your email by clicking the link sent to your inbox. The verification link expires in 48 hours. You must be at least 13 years old to create an account. Each email address can only be used for one account. If you already have an account with that email, you'll need to reset your password instead. During signup, you can optionally add a profile picture and phone number. Your account will be created immediately but certain features require email verification. We do not share your personal information with third parties without consent.

title: Payment Methods
content: We accept credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. To add a payment method, go to Settings > Billing > Add Payment Method. All transactions are encrypted using industry-standard SSL technology and PCI DSS compliance. You can set a default payment method for automatic billing. We support multiple currencies including USD, EUR, GBP, and JPY. Payment information is securely stored and tokenized - we never store your full card number. You can add up to 5 payment methods per account. Failed payments will be retried automatically 3 times over 7 days. Bank transfers typically take 3-5 business days to process. PayPal payments are instant. You'll receive email receipts for all transactions. Refunds are processed to the original payment method within 5-10 business days.

title: Subscription Plans
content: We offer three subscription tiers: Basic ($9.99/month), Pro ($19.99/month), and Enterprise ($49.99/month). Basic includes core features with 1GB storage, email support, and access for 1 user. Pro adds advanced analytics, priority support, 50GB storage, API access, and up to 5 team members. Enterprise includes custom integrations, dedicated account manager, unlimited storage, phone support, SSO, and unlimited users. Annual billing saves 20% on all plans - that's $95.90/year for Basic, $191.90/year for Pro, and $479.90/year for Enterprise. You can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately with prorated billing. Downgrades take effect at the next billing cycle. All plans include a 14-day free trial with no credit card required. Educational institutions get 50% off Pro and Enterprise plans. Non-profits qualify for free Pro accounts.

title: Data Export
content: Users can export their data at any time from Settings > Data & Privacy > Export Data. Choose between JSON, CSV, or PDF formats. The export includes all your profile information, activity history, uploaded files, messages, and settings. Large exports may take up to 24 hours to process and will be sent via email as a downloadable link. The download link expires after 7 days for security. JSON format is best for developers and includes all metadata. CSV format works well with spreadsheet applications. PDF format is human-readable and suitable for archiving. You can request exports once per day. Exports are encrypted and password-protected. The file size limit for exports is 5GB - larger datasets will be split into multiple files. You can also schedule automatic monthly exports.

title: Two-Factor Authentication
content: Two-factor authentication (2FA) is a security method that requires two different forms of verification to access your account. Enable 2FA for enhanced security by going to Settings > Security > Two-Factor Authentication. The first factor is your password, and the second factor can be a code sent via SMS, generated by an authenticator app, or a hardware security key. You can use SMS codes sent to your phone, authenticator apps like Google Authenticator or Authy, or physical hardware security keys like YubiKey. Backup codes are provided during setup - save these in a secure location in case you lose access to your 2FA device. Each backup code can only be used once. You'll need to enter your 2FA code every time you log in from a new device. Trusted devices can be remembered for 30 days. If you lose your 2FA device, use a backup code or contact support with identity verification. 2FA significantly reduces the risk of unauthorized account access even if your password is compromised.

title: API Access
content: Developers can access our REST API with Pro and Enterprise plans. Generate API keys from Settings > Developer > API Keys. Each account can create up to 10 API keys. Rate limits are 1000 requests/hour for Pro and 10000 requests/hour for Enterprise. If you exceed the rate limit, you'll receive a 429 error and need to wait until the next hour. Full API documentation is available at docs.example.com/api with interactive examples and code snippets in Python, JavaScript, Ruby, and PHP. Use Bearer token authentication for all requests by including your API key in the Authorization header. API keys can be scoped with specific permissions like read-only or write access. Keys can be rotated or revoked at any time. All API requests are logged for 90 days. We support webhooks for real-time event notifications. API responses are in JSON format. CORS is enabled for browser-based applications. Our API has 99.9% uptime SLA for Enterprise customers.

title: Customer Support
content: Contact our support team via email at support@example.com or through live chat available 24/7 for Pro and Enterprise users. Basic users can submit tickets through the help center at help.example.com. Average response time is 24 hours for email, under 5 minutes for live chat, and 2 hours for help center tickets. Phone support is available for Enterprise customers at 1-800-EXAMPLE during business hours (9 AM - 6 PM EST, Monday-Friday). Our support team speaks English, Spanish, French, German, and Japanese. For urgent issues, Enterprise customers can escalate to priority support. We maintain a comprehensive knowledge base with over 500 articles, video tutorials, and FAQs. Community forums are available for all users to ask questions and share solutions. Screen sharing is available during live chat sessions. Support tickets are tracked with unique IDs and you'll receive email updates on progress. We aim for first-contact resolution whenever possible.

title: File Upload Limits
content: Basic users can upload files up to 10MB each with 1GB total storage. Pro users get 100MB per file with 50GB storage. Enterprise users have 1GB per file with unlimited storage. Supported formats include documents (PDF, DOCX, XLSX, TXT, RTF), images (PNG, JPG, GIF, SVG, WEBP), videos (MP4, MOV, AVI, WEBM), and archives (ZIP, RAR, TAR). Files are automatically scanned for viruses and malware using multiple antivirus engines. Infected files are quarantined and you'll be notified immediately. Upload speeds depend on your internet connection but our servers support up to 1 Gbps. Files are stored with AES-256 encryption at rest. You can organize files into folders and subfolders. File versioning keeps the last 10 versions for Pro users and unlimited versions for Enterprise. Deleted files are kept in trash for 30 days before permanent deletion. You can share files with other users via secure links with optional password protection and expiration dates. Bulk uploads are supported via drag-and-drop or ZIP file extraction.

title: Account Deletion
content: To delete your account permanently, go to Settings > Data & Privacy > Delete Account. You will be asked to confirm by entering your password and typing 'DELETE' to prevent accidental deletion. All your data including profile, files, messages, and settings will be permanently deleted within 30 days. During this 30-day grace period, your account is deactivated but you can cancel the deletion request by logging in and clicking 'Restore Account'. After 30 days, data recovery is not possible and the deletion is irreversible. If you have an active subscription, it will be cancelled and you may be eligible for a prorated refund. Shared files will be removed from other users' access. If you're part of a team, you'll be removed from all team workspaces. Your username will become available for others to use after 90 days. We retain minimal data for legal compliance (transaction records, support tickets) for 7 years as required by law. Before deleting, we recommend exporting your data. Account deletion is final and cannot be undone.
